title: Noisy Head
author: Dan Heuertz
description: Learn how to quiet the noise in your head and focus on what matters most in your business.

title: Pitch Before Product
author: Cary Chessick
description: Discover why you should validate your business idea before building your product.

title: Book of Nuggets
author: The Skinny Platform
description: 15 participants in the Chicagoland collaborative meeting worked together to write this book to share insights they have gained over their decades of experience working with over 800 businesses.
